name: The Frisky Foursome Part 2
mes:
Level 0 - Outside The Tower

*You woke up in the middle of the night to hear some stuff banging around. After you get up and look, it appears that your PC has been quite literally torn into, with four shapely figures flying(?) off into the distance carrying your hard drive.*

*Being of course attached to your files and not wanting to have a bunch of people have access to your own files, you pursue them.*

*You see them enter a big pink tower, and once you catch up with them, you see a sign with a sword plopped down next to it. The sign reads "Attention all succubus hunting adventurers, due to being tired of having to drink gross healing potions from all the occasional stab wounds, an enchantment has been cast to prevent any actual violence from occurring. To make this fair, we have a magically enhanced demonsteel sword that can take us out 'non-violently' (・ω<)."*.

*Grabbing the sword, you now stand at the entrance to the tower.*

name: The Frisky Foursome Part 2
mes:
Level 1 - The Kunocubus

*Gira mustered his strength and managed to forcefully throw off the Kunocubus, partially dislodging her grip as he spun around to finally face her. But she was fast—too fast.*

*In an instant, the Kunocubus vanished into a puff of smoke, her giggles echoing from the uncertain shadows surrounding them. The sounds swirled about him, making his head spin as he tried to locate her exact position.*

"Aww, did you really think it would be that easy?" Her voice oozed from the darkness like honey laced with venom. "Poor little hunter, trying so hard to resist..."

*Suddenly, she rematerialized several feet away, her eyes twinkling with dark mischief. The kunoichi began a slow, deliberate sway in front of him, the motion of her hips drawing attention to her seductive figure as she leaned casually against a nearby desk.*

"You might want to look but can't touch," she taunted as her hands drifted provocatively over her plush breasts and down towards the alluring zipper of her bodysuit. "But I promise you, you'll get much better if you follow my lead..."

*With a quick shimmying motion, she took a step back unseen, leaving only the tantalizing glimpse of her chest's deep cleft illuminated by the ambient glow.*
